US BANK HOLIDAY: November 11, 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Friday, November 11, 2022, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to Veterans Day in the US on November 11, 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Monday, November 14, 2022.

Credit card transactions, including PayPal, are not affected. EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish our US customers a very happy Veterans Day!
